item.title: Scientists Have Just Discovered a New Type of Electricity-Conducting Bacteria

item.title: The Dream of the Metaverse Is Dying. Manufacturing Is Keeping It Alive
item.description: Forget Mark Zuckerberg’s vision of VR meetings; the industrial metaverse bridges digital and physical worlds in a way that’s actually useful.
